content: >this pattern is available for downloading also on payhip 1 with a pay what you want option **pattern features ** - knitted toe up - instructions written for magic loop but dpns can be used as well - instructions written in metric and us terminology - two sizes small 64 sts and medium 72 sts - gusset at the centre of the sole followed by a round heel turn and a slipped-stitch heel flap - charts but no written instructions for the stranded colourwork 1 https //payhip com/b/tz6fr
